p:
Rates of gross primary production (GPP) were determined every week for each mesocosm using the diel oxygen technique
62 . DO and temperature were measured every 15 min for 24 h at a depth of 0.4 m, using a multi-parameter meter (HQ40d, Hach, Loveland, CO, USA) equipped with a luminescent/optical dissolved oxygen (LDO) probe (IntelliCAL LDO101). Probes contain a factory calibration of which its accuracy was checked each week by measurements of 0 and 100% O 2-saturated water as well as by comparing readings of the two oxygen probes in a single mesocosm. GPP was calculated following the equations in Table 2 of ref.
62 , in which the piston velocity ( k) was determined in deoxygenated water as mentioned before.
